messages.message: Hey Team :wave:, as of yesterday the tracing instrumentation has moved from jaeger(opentracing) to opentelemetry in a few sandboxes - `aihub-sandbox`, `crafting-aihub` and `crafting-cyp`. This shouldn't affect anything in terms of how we generate or query spans but allows us to bring our tracing infrastructure up to date and also unblock some dependency upgrades (Ex: protobufs, grpc) :slightly_smiling_face:. However if you notice issues with the traces with these changes, let me know in this thread.
This is amazing, thanks for tirelessly pushing out all the changes!
